text: Terbanggi Besar–Pematang Panggang–Kayu Agung Toll Road, often abbreviated as Terpeka is a 189.2 kilometres long toll road that connects Terbanggi Besar, Pematang Panggang, and Kayu Agung in the island of Sumatra, Indonesia.This toll road is a network of Trans-Sumatra Toll Road, and connected to Bakauheni- Terbanggi Besar Toll Road and Kayu Agung–Palembang–Betung Toll Road ==Toll gates == {| class="wikitable" ! Toll gate ! KM ! Destination |- |Terbanggi Besar |140 |Terbanggi Besar, Bandar Jaya, Kota Bumi |- |Gunung Batin |166 |Gunung Batin |- |Menggala |184 |Panaragan, Menggala |- |Lambu Kibang |201 |Lambu Kibang, Banjar Agung, Menggala |- |Way Kenanga |219 |Way Kenanga, Way Serdang, SP Asahan |- |Pematang |239 |Pematang Panggang, Mesuji |- |Kayu Agung |325 |Kayu Agung |} ==See also== * Trans-Sumatra Toll Road ==References== Category:Toll roads in Indonesia Category:Transport in Lampung
title: Terbanggi Besar–Pematang Panggang Toll Road
